Reviews.Title: NO DIRECT EXTERNAL SPEAKERS CONNECTION
Reviews.Author: REMOTE
Reviews.Content: TOO BAD U CANT CONNECT UR HOME SPEAKERS BY SPEAKER WIRES TO ENJOY HI FI THEATER SOUND WELL U CAN USE IT FOR A SLED RIDE IN THE SNOW.

Reviews.Title: Good quality.
Reviews.Author: tory b
Reviews.Content: The TV is as advertised.It was easy to put together and set up. The sound is not great if you enjoy a cinematic experience for movies and the picture is not perfect for action and sports.I've had the TV for about a month and I have no big complaints.I would recommend this TV for someone who is looking for a quality TV, but does not want to spend a lot of money.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ben Holt
Reviews.Content: Only had a couple of days but picture is very good you can look on angleand still very good. Sound is ok could be better but TV companies want a good pictureand expect you to supply speakers of course if you want awesome sound.the price was awesome.
